ac_in.text: Confirm transformer secondary VAC (Blue → Blue/White) is 17–24 VAC.

suspect_transformer.text: VAC out of range. Check primary wiring/tap and transformer. Replace if needed.

v5.text: Measure +5V regulator on PIB (Brown → Brown/White). Expect 4.8–5.2 VDC.

pib_power.text: PIB supply/regulator issue. Inspect rectifier, filter caps, regulator; verify AC input.

prod100.text: Set production to 100% before cell tests. Continue when set.

revA.text: Measure cell voltage (center → outside post). Expect 22–28 VDC.

revB.text: Measure cell voltage (center → outside post). Expect 29–32 VDC.

cell_or_driver.text: Cell voltage out of range. If AC and +5V OK, suspect PIB drivers/rectifier or deteriorated cell.

cell_current.text: Measure shunt millivolts (cell current). Expect 100–145 mV DC.

current_low_high.text: If low: clean cell, verify salinity/flow, end-of-life possible. If high: suspect short/scaled cell or driver fault.

result_ok.text: Readings within spec. No issues detected with provided measurements.
